item.title: Command Line General (Linux)
item.description: ffmpeg ffmpeg cut specific timeline from video ffmpeg -ss < starting point > -i < input > -t < how long > -vcodec copy -acodec copy < output > eg; ffmpeg -ss 00:00:30 -i input.mp4 -t 00:00:05 -vcodec copy -acodec copy output.mp4 merge multiple videos vim files.txt 1 2 file 'vid_1.mp4' file 'vid_2.mp4' ffmpeg -f concat -safe 0 -i files.

item.title: Tools
item.description: Arch Linux # linux operating system vim, left # text editor gimp, krita, libresprite, noodle # 2d drawing blender # 3d modelling

item.title: Arch Linux Installation (Legacy)
item.description: â— (BIOS type {Legacy}) Make Bootable USB Wipe Disk Disk partitioning â€“> {legacy} Encryption –> cryptsetup/luks Formatting&Mounting Downloading {base} TODO Timezone Language root&user setup TODO TODO TODO TODO General setup Install Gnome Optional Step 1: (Make bootable USB) Download iso –> !verify Use gnome-disk for make bootable USB –> restore disk image Setup bios for booting from USB –> boot arch-linux Step 2: (Wipe Disk) â— Before this step you may need backup your important files.
